Ecology: Collected from bottoms with sand, algae.

30 °03’ 17 ’’S

44 ° 33 ’–
45 ° 16 ’W
, 18–25 m (bottom: muddy sand) (YW et al. 91 ), 101 m (VB et al. 00).

Remarks:
Microphoxus J.L. Barnard, 1960
contains five known species, one from Costa Rica , three from Brazil and the present species from the Magellan area herein checked. All the species are distinguished from each other by many morphological characters combined: length of rostrum and rami of uropods, setal formulas on article 4 of antenna 2 , setation of mouthparts, epimera and appendages.

Recently, Chiesa et al. ( 2005 ) recorded
Microphoxus cornutus
in Tierra del Fuego and Rauschert (unpubl.) in southern Chile . Alonso de Pina (unpubl.) expanded its distribution in Chubut, Golfo San José.
